main event: Observers watched a blue-white colored object with a rotating red light in the southern sky on 27th February 1967.
interesting points: The object followed a zig-zag course before hovering and disappearing., Different accounts from the witnesses noted conflicting directions of movement (NE and SE)., The object initially appeared as two white lights that fused into one larger light., The object was described as round, slightly glowing, and silent during observation., The report mentions a questionnaire to be filled out by the witness for further investigation.
sighted object: a blue-white colored object with a rotating red light
witness description: The witness reported that the object did not resemble a conventional aircraft and exhibited unusual motion.
